title: Mount Mugh
description: Small, remote mountain peak in Tajikistan with a castle used in the 7th-8th centuries CE as a refuge by the Sogdian rulers of Panjakent. The site was the source of a major find of Sogdian documents.

properties.description: Approximate imagery location based on Google Earth representing Mount Mugh after Lurje 2019.
properties.title: Approximate imagery location of Mount Mugh Fortress
